title: Riot player support won't respond to my request
body:
Hi.

I have sent a ticket to riot support 6 days ago.
As of this moment I have not received a response from riot support. My ticket sits there, open and unresolved and as far as I know unread, even.
Last time when I sent a ticket to riot support it was answered in a day so I find this a bit strange.
Now my request is a server transfer on my other account, which has been recently hacked and tranfered to Russia since it only cost 1 rp a couple of weeks ago.
This means I haven't been able to play for the past couple of weeks.
If any rioter happens to see this post and is willing to help me out, here is my ticket number: #32049849

Thank you.

replies.body: I don't have a lot of visibility over EU support, but there might be some investigation time here as EUW support collaborates with Russian support to find out what happened.  I checked your ticket, and it is in queue.  Hang tight and a specialist will reach out as soon as they can!
